basics.name: Renato Ćurić
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: IT Professional with over 10 years of experience in the industry. Specializing in custom software solutions, Renato provides support for colleagues on various projects and topics, ranging from software development, architecture, deployments, different types of integrations and more.

work.summary: At King ICT, my primary task is to design, develop and implement the company's CI/CD strategy and to assist in the development process. By creating a solid knowledge base and deployment framework, software development teams can almost effortlessly implement automatic build and deployment pipelines.
highlights: Successfuly implemented CI/CD in ongoing projects
Consultant for System Architecture, Security and Custom Software Implementations

work.summary: Working as a DevOps Engineer at Comsysto involved several tasks. Support of colleagues in internet tasks as well as contribution to own project. Most of the work revolves around developing and deploying infrastructure and automation scripts.
highlights: Talks on local meetups and conferences

work.summary: In Croadria, I worked mainly as a Linux system administrator. Daily tasks included Linux server administration, customer support, installation and configuration of new systems (HW and SW), and data center operations (management of tape libraries, servers, switches). Customer support included debugging PHP and shell scripts, as well as various other requirements (customized configurations, website and email migrations).

As a Microsoft system administrator in Iskon, I worked in a fast moving, constantly changing environment. My main responsibility was to answer service desk requests (jira ticket, e-mail, phone) as well as to maintain various Microsoft-based systems (SCCM, antivirus server, multiple data servers, domain controllers, print servers ...).
highlights: The best department in internal surveys for 3 years in a row

courses: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2021 Certified Architect Associate (23.11.2021 - 23.11.2023)
Red Hat OpenShift I: Containers & Kubernetes (DO180)

publications.name: Private Cloud Infrastructure With OpenNebula
publications.summary: Do you want to leverage the power of cloud computing but you don't want to use public cloud solutions? With OpenNebula, you can accomplish the goal of private cloud while using already available hardware in your data center.

publications.name: e2e Testing With TestCafe and Cucumber.JS
publications.summary: Testing web applications automatically from the user perspective has always been a tedious task. Most of the time the automation setup would have been fragile and prone to breaking. It would put a big strain on Operations because of the rapid change in software requirements. Documenting the actual tests so that business and development can have use of the work done has also been cumbersome and that's the reason we would avoid doing it.

projects.company: Ministry of Physical Planning, Construction and State Property
projects.name: Electronic Construction Diary
projects.description: Web application for monitoring of the construction process. It covers the process from obtaining a building permit and registration of the construction site to the technical inspection of the constructed building. The complete infrastructure is designed and deployed on the National Cloud Infrastructure (CDU).
keywords: React, Spring Boot, Jenkins, Grafana, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Prometheus

projects.name: Drone Fleet Manager
projects.description: SPA application for managing drone fleet and coressponding equipment. My duties included installing and configuring Oracle DB, Keycloak IAM, CI/CD infrastructure as well as supporting the development process.
keywords: Keycloak, Oracle 12c DB, Jenkins, Centos Linux

projects.name: Electronic Toll Collection
projects.description: System that simplifies recording and billing of tickets (Tolls). The system consists of 3 applications: web and mobile applications for end users and backoffice application. The system is dependant on various support systems that are deployed on both Windows and Linux servers. For this project my main responsibilities were the installation and configuration of: RabbitMQ cluster, Redis cluster, Keycloak IAM cluster, implementing custom application performance monitoring solution, developing and implementing the CI/CD strategy as well as providing support in production in the form of system upgrades and maintenance.
keywords: React Native, ASP .NET Core 3, .NET 5, Grafana, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Prometheus, Jenkins

projects.name: Croatian Census 2021
projects.description: Croatian Census 2021 was fully digitalized. The data were collected by using 2 front facing applications; 1 for residents and 1 for Croatian Bureau of Statistics employees. The 3rd application was used for data and user management, as well as generating and listing reports. My duties were involved around designing the production system as well as orchestrating the deployment and DR strategy for the applications. I have successfully implemented various subsystems and clusters, the most prominent ones were: Keycloak IAM clustering and PostgreSQL clustering. I've have successfully designed and implemented the monitoring and alerting solution based on Prometheus, Grafana and Elasticsearch. By working closely with the infrastructure provider, we have ensured 0 downtime for our applications as well as 100% availability through the whole census process.
keywords: PHP, Symphony, VUE.js, Docker, Jenkins, Keycloak, Grafana, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Prometheus
Sentry Monitoring, Jasper Reporting, Redis, NGINX, PostgreSQL

projects.name: Web Page Rework
projects.description: Work is done remotely from Zagreb (Croatia) by a cross functional Scrum team. We are re-building the customer's website using modern technologies, front end is coded in Angular and the back end using Java Spring Boot. My tasks include writing e2e tests in JS using the TestCafe framework combined with Cucumber as well as the maintenance of the Jenkins and various build scripts. Providing support to internal and external colleagues regarding DevOps topics (mostly regarding CI/CD infrastructure).
keywords: Jenkins, Cucumber, TestCafe, SonarCube, CI/CD, SCRUM, Nexus

projects.name: Building AWS infrastructure for analytics project at TEF
projects.description: Building the AWS infrastructure for a short term analytics project at Telefonica Germany. The infrastructure was based on best practices recommended by AWS ( 1 instance total). CentOS was the Linux flavor used in this project. Various configuration changes we're performed on the Linux VM.

projects.name: WebPresence
projects.description: Integration of a new centralized web-hosting platform for Deutsche Telekom Group. I collaborated with other team members in means of system architecture and integration as well as PoC. Presented the project in front of the Committee for evaluation in Magyar Telekom.
keywords: OpenShift, Docker, OpenVZ, Ceph Storage, Plesk & OBAS, KeyCloak
